block.p: AMERICAN SPEEDWAY ASSOCIATION -- Named Joe Balash technical director. KANSAS SPEEDWAY -- Named Russ Tysinger director of facility operations, effective Aug. 1.
AMERICAN SPEEDWAY ASSOCIATION -- Named Joe Balash technical director. KANSAS SPEEDWAY -- Named Russ Tysinger director of facility operations, effective Aug. 1.

American League TEXAS RANGERS -- Optioned RHP Ryan Glynn to Oklahoma of the PCL. Recalled RHP Jonathan Johnson from Oklahoma. TORONTO BLUE JAYS -- Signed OF Miguel Negron, RHP David Abbott, RHP Jerrod Payne, RHP Charles Chulk, 3B Shawn Fagan, LHP Josh McMillan, RHP Andres McCulloch and RHP Lanny Patten.

National League PITTSBURGH PIRATES -- Reassigned first-base coach Joe Jones and third-base coach Jack Lind and offered them other positions within the organization. Named Tommy Sandt first-base coach, Trent Jewett third-base coach, Richie Hebner manager and Dave Clark hitting coach for Nashville of the PCL. Recalled INF Abraham Nunez from Nashville. Designated 1B Ivan Cruz for assignment.

National Basketball Association NBA -- Announced senior vice president of basketball operations Stu Jackson will assume the responsibilities of head of the basketball operations department, effective July 1. DETROIT PISTONS -- Promoted Joe Dumars to president of basketball operations. Named George Irvine coach, and signed him to a multiyear contract, and Brendan Suhr director of player personnel.
National Football League MINNESOTA VIKINGS -- Signed LB Bryce Paup. WASHINGTON REDSKINS -- Waived RB Ray Zellars and P Jeff Walker.
Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS -- Signed DE Eric Schwab and OL Matt Sheridan.
National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES -- Named Craig Button general manager.

BRADLEY -- Announced the resignation of Pat Donahue, men's associate head basketball coach. COLLEGE OF CHARLESTON -- Named Zenarae Pieters women's assistant basketball coach. EVANGEL -- Named Al Poland baseball coach. FLORIDA -- Named Matthew Mitchell women's assistant basketball coach. GEORGIA SOUTHERN -- Named Tom Spencer men's assistant basketball coach. LA SALLE -- Named Mike McCarron assistant basketball coach. MANHATTAN -- Named Tom Sowinski pitching coach for the 2000-2001 season. MISSOURI-KANSAS CITY -- Named Jody Adams women's assistant basketball coach. SYRACUSE -- Named Harold Luther assistant strength and conditioning coach. URSINUS -- Announced the resignation of George White, men's basketball coach.
